extraction_text: Design Change: Bogie Mounting Bracket (v2.1) (DOC003) Type: Design Change Notice Source: Engineering SharePoint Received: 2025-09-03 Deadline: 2025-09-30 Responsible: Procurement & Rolling Stock Engineer Priority: High Summary: Engineering has approved a design modification to the bogie mounting bracket.
